code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:55 YO female psychiatrist presents w/ c/o 4 weeks h/o moderate fever, moderate cough, moderate malaise and Respiratory. Denies ever using tobacco she denies drinking alcohol o:Height 161 cm, Weight 51.3 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18, persistent coughing during visit, HEENT: WNL, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to pulmonary disease.
